content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=-15.0 y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5 y=-49.5)

### Coal mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0 y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5 y=-82.5)

### Furnace group at position(40.0, -82.0)
Consists of multiple furnaces at positions (40.0, -82.0), (45.0, -83.0), (42.0, -81.0), (45.0, -80.0), (40.0, -79.0)

### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of a steam engine (position x=10.5 y=10.5), a boiler (position x=-6.0 y=24.5) and an offshore pump (position x=-9.5 y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Inserter group at positions(3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of multiple burners at positions (3.5, 0.5) and (0.5, 3.5) with connected chests

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
- Empty the chest at the specified position to continue mining or other activities
### Errors when no input liquid or fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the steam engine has a connected pipe with fluid to function properly
### Errors when out of fuel
- Refuel the boiler to maintain its functionality
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
### Errors when no research in progress
- Start a research in the lab to utilize its functionality
